channel.title: Help last questions :)
channel.description:
hey i might be bothering to you but i have searched the search tab alot but i cant find theese
1. how to add models / make models of npc's / what program to use and how to edit
2. how to add commands like ::bank ::explode ::beasts
3. how to add new customs weapon (i know how) but what program used for making the models.
4. (last) what is the best source to use and client? not the mopar client idk why. but i dont like it i feel horrible when i use it
thx answer fast plz thx

item.title: Help last questions :)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Questions 1 and 3 are client related, go to the model section for the answer to them.
As for the other two, server side.

So, moved.

Read full topic
